title: Number of casinos worldwide 2011 by region
summary: This statistic displays the Number of casinos in selected countries in Number 2011 .
North_America had region far the highest Number of casinos owned region Number casinos companies , followed region Western_Europe and the Eastern_Europe .
In Western_Europe there were 682 Number casinos in 2011 and in the Eastern_Europe 479 in the same year .
gold: This statistic shows the number of casinos worldwide by region in 2011 . In that year , North America was the region with the most casinos with 1,623 . In 2016 , the U.S. casino gaming market had revenues of 71.1 billion U.S. dollars .
